item.description: Caitlin does a pretty good impression of the old WWII "Kilroy Was Here" cartoon, instead of having an afternoon nap.

item.description: Caitlin shows off her crawling skills which, although not quite perfected, now allow her to get around pretty well.

item.description: Caitlin playing on the beach, where we stopped off on our way back from the Hunter Valley, during the Labour Day holiday weekend.

item.description: Caitlin, Mum and Dad stumble across the local flora within the Botany Bay National Park.

item.description: Caitlin and her Dad re-enact the landing of Captain Cook in Australia - taken in Botany Bay National Park, the site of the original landing.

item.title: Lip Smacking
item.description: Caitlin figures out how to make a noise with her lower lip, while she relaxes on her playmat.

item.description: Big news, after some careful positioning by Mum, Caitlin is able to sit up without any support!

item.title: Bouncing and Laughing
item.description: A short video of our six-month-old daughter being bounced by Dad and laughing as Mum shoots

item.title: New Camera - what the ?
item.description: A short video of our five-month-old daughter, as she tries to figure out what her Mum is doing with the camera.
